name: Rita | Luxury Furniture by Christopher Guy Singapore
description: With a tilt of her head and kicking her heels, floating in a froth of tulle blossoms, the diva depicted in this simply fabulous mosaic is modeled after the Hollywood star Rita Hayworth. Made with over seventeen thousand hand-cut, hand-colored, and hand-placed tiny glass tiles, this is a truly exceptional piece of wall art that will bring delight for a lifetime.
